QuestData.Title: Apply Directly to the Forehead
QuestData.Description: Well... THAT was unexpected!$B$BCome to think of it, now Ken-Ken remember why hozen use mask in the first place...$B$BA legend about the Monkey King says he used a mask to cure old pandaren emperor, Shaohao, when he was too sad to lead his people. Then they buried mask--with all his sadness--in the ground.$B$BWe should use the mask on more pandaren, but instead of putting sad away in ground, we gonna PUNCH ITS BUTT.$B$BLet's do this, $n!
QuestData.LogDescription: Use Ken-Ken's Mask to cure 8 Despondent Wardens of Zhu in Zhu's Watch.
QuestData.CompletionText: This must be the emperor's sad coming back! That is some oooold sad.$B$BKen-Ken bet pandaren sad get stronger with age, too, like pandaren booze.
QuestData.RewardText: We saving pandaren, but the land still sad... Look, rain's not stopping at all!$B$B<Ken-Ken shakes his tiny fists at the sky.>$B$BHow many more butts we gotta punch before we fix this town?!$B$B<The sky darkens in response.>
